metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000004 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In the Linux kernel 4.12, 3.10, 2.6 and possibly earlier versions a racecondition vulnerability exists in the sound system, this can lead to adeadlock and denial of service condition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000004` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-121-generic - 4.4.0-121.145
